alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:44PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Houston and southwestern Early Counties through 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/... At 144 PM EDT/1244 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ashford, or 7 miles northeast of Cottonwood, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gordon, Saffold, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Howards Mill, Chattahoochee SP, Lucy and Cedar Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
